channel.title: Is this allowed
channel.description: Well i went onto a server and it was called Pur3Pkscape v3 and alls it is is a spinoff of fr33sc4p3. Only thing is different is npc say differ stuff and apprently is a download as a source.

item.title: Is this allowed
item.dc:creator: @Steph1 .Steph
item.description:
@Steph1 wrote:

[quote="† Revolation †, post:1, topic:108395"]Hey! I know you dont like getting Messages about this, But i think your looking for a server, if you are then check this out…

I am the proud owner of Revolation Scape! And i do work on it a whole lot! And i hope that you can come to my server some time! Its awesome! BUT IMPORTANT is to read my forums, Check out Revolation Scape Forums! And i hope that You do come along!

Forums:

http://revolationscape.smfforfree3.com/index.php

This is the newest Update currently:

[/quote]

Don’t ever do that again. This isn’t the place to post it.
ON TOPIC: There are heaps of servers like that, people that don’t know how to code.
BUT. I don’t think it’s allowed, it gets annoying though

Read full topic

item.title: Is this allowed

item.description:

K i thought so, and it basically is an exact copy. Please dont advertise your server here revolation.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this allowed

item.description:
@Threatening wrote:

as long as the server is not a exact copy of a server then its okay…but you want your server to be original…
